title: Pole Top
description: Finial - Pole Top, bronze, two confronted long necked lions, joined at paws to form circular hole at bottom and similar hole at top through which would pass the neck of a pole for mounting, two heads have open mouths to form a third circular opening which matches those below, undecorated except for incised lines indicating paws and shoulders, and a beaded line Luristan, IX-V Century B.C. cat. card dims
